string-array.name: pre_question_list
string-array.item: Is access to the site adequate?
Is the access to the equipment adequate?
Is there safe working platform and access available?
Is scaffolding required to carry out the job safely?
Are there units located at any roof edges without parapet?
Is there sufficient working space around the unit?
Are electrical devices such as isolators, circuit breakers & ELCB in place?
Can the equipment be isolated and locked-out?
Is there any rotating equipment (machines) without machine guards?
Are there any sharp edges?
Is there any job to be performed in confined space?
Are there any walking/working hazards (slipping, tripping hazards)?
Is there any risk of falling from heights: roofs, stair case, platforms etc?
Is there any overhead hazard?
Is there any of worker in contact with high temperature?
Any hazards such as the worker strike against, struck by, caught in between?
Any hazard of inhaling / absorbing toxic substances?
Any hazard of exposing to the chemical / physical agents?
Any jobs involved pulling, pushing, over reaching or any awkward position?
Is it safe to perform welding, cutting, brazing etc. & handling of gas cylinder?
Is there any fire hazard? Combustible material stored?
Is the general housekeeping safe enough to perform the job?

resources.string: I agree the terms and conditions.
